item.title: Doesn't add points when you kill?
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

The points you are adding there are to each player; not to the team itself.
A way is around this is by using a “Global” variable instead, since client.java is for each player, you’ll have to use a file that is only used once- indefinitely. IE server.java, you’d make the int in server… And to up it: server.clientHandler.czpoints++;

Is an example, also you don’t need to use += 1, ++ works the same way and is shorter.
